mapper.select: select count(*) from ope_customer_inquiry oci left join ope_customer_inquiry_b ocib on oci.id = ocib.inquiry_id and ocib.dr = 0 left join ope_car_distribute ocd on oci.customer_id = ocd.customer_id and ocd.dr = 0 left join ope_car_distribute_node ocdn on ocdn.customer_id = oci.customer_id and ocdn.dr = 0 left join ope_sale_scooter oss on oss.id = oci.product_id and oss.dr = 0 left join ope_specificat_type ost on ost.id = oss.specificat_id and ost.dr = 0 left join ope_color oc on oc.id = oss.color_id and oc.dr = 0 left join ope_customer customer on customer.id = oci.customer_id and customer.dr = 0 where oci.dr = 0 and customer.status = 2

select oci.id, oci.order_no, IFNULL(ocdn.app_node, 1) as appNode, IFNULL(ocdn.node, 1) as webNode, IFNULL(ocdn.flag, 0) as flag, ost.id as specificatTypeId, ost.specificat_name as scooterName, oc.id as colorId, oc.color_name, ocib.product_qty as batteryNum, ocd.battery, IFNULL(ocd.seat_number, 2) as seatNumber, IFNULL(oci.full_name, customer.company_name) as customerName, oci.customer_id, oci.email, oci.created_time from ope_customer_inquiry oci left join ope_customer_inquiry_b ocib on oci.id = ocib.inquiry_id and ocib.dr = 0 left join ope_car_distribute ocd on oci.customer_id = ocd.customer_id and ocd.dr = 0 left join ope_car_distribute_node ocdn on ocdn.customer_id = oci.customer_id and ocdn.dr = 0 left join ope_sale_scooter oss on oss.id = oci.product_id and oss.dr = 0 left join ope_specificat_type ost on ost.id = oss.specificat_id and ost.dr = 0 left join ope_color oc on oc.id = oss.color_id and oc.dr = 0 left join ope_customer customer on customer.id = oci.customer_id and customer.dr = 0 where oci.dr = 0 and customer.status = 2
order by oci.created_time desc limit #{param.startRow}, #{param.pageSize}

sql.if: and (ocdn.flag is null or ocdn.flag = 0) and ( (ocdn.app_node is null or ocdn.app_node = 1 ) or (ocdn.node is null or ocdn.node = 1 ) )
and ocd.warehouse_account_id = #{warehouseAccountId} and ocdn.flag = 1 and ocdn.app_node in (2, 3, 4, 5)
and ocd.warehouse_account_id = #{warehouseAccountId} and ocdn.flag = 2 and ocdn.app_node = 6

and ( (ocdn.flag is null or ocdn.flag = 0) and ( (ocdn.app_node is null or ocdn.app_node = 1 ) or (ocdn.node is null or ocdn.node = 1 ) ) and (oci.order_no like concat('%', #{param.keyword}, '%') or oci.full_name like concat('%', #{param.keyword}, '%')) )
or ( ocd.warehouse_account_id = #{warehouseAccountId} and ocdn.flag = 1 and ocdn.app_node in (2, 3, 4, 5) and (oci.order_no like concat('%', #{param.keyword}, '%') or oci.full_name like concat('%', #{param.keyword}, '%')) )
or ( ocd.warehouse_account_id = #{warehouseAccountId} and ocdn.flag = 2 and ocdn.app_node = 6 and (oci.order_no like concat('%', #{param.keyword}, '%') or oci.full_name like concat('%', #{param.keyword}, '%')) )

mapper.select: select ost.id as specificatTypeId, oci.customer_id, ost.specificat_name as scooterName, oc.color_name, oc.id as colorId, ocib.product_qty as batteryNum, IFNULL(ocd.seat_number, 2) as seatNumber, ocd.rsn, ocd.tablet_sn, ocd.bluetooth_address, ocd.license_plate, ocd.bbi, ocd.controller, ocd.electric_machinery, ocd.meter, ocd.imei, ocd.vin_code, ocdn.app_node, ocd.battery from ope_customer_inquiry oci left join ope_customer_inquiry_b ocib on oci.id = ocib.inquiry_id and ocib.dr = 0 left join ope_car_distribute ocd on oci.customer_id = ocd.customer_id and ocd.dr = 0 left join ope_car_distribute_node ocdn on ocdn.customer_id = oci.customer_id and ocdn.dr = 0 left join ope_sale_scooter oss on oss.id = oci.product_id and oss.dr = 0 left join ope_specificat_type ost on ost.id = ocd.specificat_type_id and ost.dr = 0 left join ope_color oc on oc.id = ocd.color_id and oc.dr = 0 where oci.id = #{param.id}
